title: Bureau of Prisons, USA Federal Prison Population, USA, 4.2.2009
name: Bureau of Prisons, USA Federal Prison Population, USA, 4.2.2009
description: This dataset displays the inmate populations for all the Federal Prisons throughout the United States on 4.2.09. This weekly Population Report can be found on the Bureau of Prisons website at bop.gov. These facilities are positioned by their lat/lon and this dataset is updated on a weekly basis.
